00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00048 void DataGroupHeaderTest::NameTest()
00049 {
00050         std::wstring p1 = L"some_name";
00051         header->SetName(p1);
00052         std::wstring p2 = header->GetName();
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1 == p2);
00054 }

00066 void DataGroupHeaderTest::FindDataSetHeaderTest()
00067 {
00068         // Create DataSetHeaders
00069         DataSetHeader dph1;
00070         dph1.SetName(L"pixel intensity");
00071         ParameterNameValueType param;
00072         param.SetName(L"Scanner");
00073         param.SetValueText(L"M10");
00074         dph1.AddNameValParam(param);
00075         dph1.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00076         dph1.SetRowCnt(1);
00077 
00078         DataSetHeader dph2;
00079         dph2.SetName(L"grid coordinates");
00080         param.SetName(L"Corner Pattern");
00081         param.SetValueText(L"Checkerboard");
00082         dph2.AddNameValParam(param);
00083         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00084         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00085         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00086         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00087 
00088         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00089         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00090         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00091         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00092 
00093         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00094         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00095         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00096         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00097 
00098         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00099         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00100         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00101         dph2.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00102         dph2.SetRowCnt(1);
00103 
00104         header->AddDataSetHdr(dph1);
00105         header->AddDataSetHdr(dph2);
00106 
00107         const DataSetHeader* dph = header->FindDataSetHeader(L"none");
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dph);
00109         dph = header->FindDataSetHeader(dph1.GetName());
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dph);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph->GetName() == dph1.GetName());
00112         dph = header->FindDataSetHeader(dph2.GetName());
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dph);
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph->GetName() == dph2.GetName());
00115 }
